Muriel Winifred Turner, Baroness Turner nke Camden (née Price; 18 Septemba 1927 - 26 February 2018) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye isi otu ndị ọrụ Britain.
N'agbata 1970 na 1987 Turner bụ onye enyemaka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ASTMS (mgbe emechara nrụpụta, sayensị na ego, Amicus na ugbu a Unite the Union)
Site na 1981 ruo 1987 ọ bụ onye otu TUC General Council
E kere ya dị ka Life Peer na 29 Mee 1985 na-ewere aha Baroness Turner nke Camden, nke Camden na Greater London

O nwere mmasị pụrụ iche na ọdịmma ọha na eze na nsogbu ezumike nká, site na 1987 ruo Ọktoba 1996 ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Front Bench na Ọrụ maka ndị ọrụ na-emegide. Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke House of Lords n'etiti afọ 2002 na 2008.

Ọ bụ onye otu Equal Opportunities Commission 1982-88; Occupational Pensions Board 1977-93; Council Member, Occupational Pension Advisory Service, 1989-2007; na onyeisi oche, Personal Investment Authority Ombudsman Council 1994-97
Ọ bụ onye otu British Parliamentary Committee for Iran Freedom.
Ọnụnọ ya na Ụlọ ahụ kwụsịrị na 13 June 2017
Ọ nwụrụ ọnwa asatọ ka e mesịrị, ọ dị afọ 90.
N'afọ 1955, Muriel Price lụrụ Reginald Thomas Frederick Turner, MC, DFC. Ha enweghị ụmụ ọ bụla mana alụmdi na nwunye ahụ wetara ụmụ abụọ. Ọ nwụrụ tupu ya, ọ nwụrụ na 1995.

Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke Humanists UK na onye mmekọ nsọpụrụ nke National Secular Society.  Na 15 Septemba 2010, Turner, ya na mmadụ 54 ndị ọzọ, bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ozi e bipụtara na The Guardian, na-ekwupụta mmegide ha megide nleta steeti Pope Benedict nke Iri na Isii na UK.
